episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and fascinating topics, including the belief that chess was brought to Earth by aliens, the slow-moving Greenland shark, the bizarre reasons for asylum admissions in the 19th century, and the Yakuza's unique approach to crime and recruitment.

facts.fact: The head of the International Chess Federation believes that chess was brought to earth by aliens.
The Greenland shark is so slow that it basically needs all of its food to be asleep in order to eat it.
In the 19th century, you could be committed to an asylum for novel reading.
The Japanese Yakuza crime syndicate has its own website, which has a theme tune designed to attract new members.
